title: Update Contact page map to restaurant coordinates

requirements.text: Update the appâ€™s configured Google Maps embed URL so the Contact page map pins the restaurant at coordinates (17.689073236620935, 83.23327778764002), without changing the existing map iframe styling or layout.

quotes: I want to make some changes on the contact page, actually the map. That map is not correct, so I want to pinpoint the correct location of my restaurant.
This is my restaurant's exact location.

acceptanceCriteria: Opening the Contact page shows an embedded Google Map centered/pinned at latitude 17.689073236620935 and longitude 83.23327778764002.
The map iframe continues to render with the same dimensions and container styling as before (e.g., the existing 400px height and rounded/bordered container).
The Contact page does not show the 'Map location is not configured yet' alert when the backend provides the configured embed URL.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui (immutable paths).
nonGoals: Redesigning the Contact page UI or changing its layout.
Changing restaurant hours, phone number, WhatsApp behavior, or other contact details.
Adding new map providers or integrations beyond the existing Google Maps iframe embed.
